msbt.message: Ohmigosh! Tonight is the COUNTDOOOWN!Let's count DOWN the old year together, then party it UP into the new year!
It's New Year's Eve, !I am TRÃˆS excited for tonight's Countdown! I'm def dressing up!Need to be le fashionable when the chic new year gets here, you know?
Are you all set for the Countdown, ? I am SO not sleeping tonight!
AHHH!!! I still have stuff I wanted to do this year! Likebe famous! And learn to sing! And dance!
